verses.verse: וְאַתָּ֡ה <S%H859><s%> ve-'at-Tah you הַקְרֵ֣ב <S%H7126><s%> hak-Rev And take אֵלֶיךָ֩ <S%H413><s%> 'e-lei-Cha about אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אַהֲרֹ֨ן <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron thou unto thee Aaron אָחִ֜יךָ <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chi-cha thy brother וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et בָּנָ֣יו <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nav and his sons אִתּ֔וֹ <S%H854><s%> it-To, from מִתּ֛וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> mit-Toch with him from among בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel לְכַהֲנוֹ־ <S%H3547><s%> le-cha-ha-nov- that he may minister unto me in the priest's office לִ֑י Li; אַהֲרֹ֕ן <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron [even] Aaron נָדָ֧ב <S%H5070><s%> na-Dav Nadab וַאֲבִיה֛וּא <S%H30><s%> va-'a-vi-Hu and Abihu אֶלְעָזָ֥ר <S%H499><s%> 'el-'a-Zar Eleazar וְאִיתָמָ֖ר <S%H385><s%> ve-'i-ta-Mar and Ithamar בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei sons אַהֲרֹֽן׃ <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron. Aaron's

וְעָשִׂ֥יתָ <S%H6213><s%> ve-'a-Si-ta And thou shalt make בִגְדֵי־ <S%H899><s%> vig-dei- garments קֹ֖דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> Ko-desh holy לְאַהֲרֹ֣ן <S%H175><s%> le-'a-ha-Ron for Aaron אָחִ֑יךָ <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chi-cha; thy brother לְכָב֖וֹד <S%H3519><s%> le-cha-Vod for glory וּלְתִפְאָֽרֶת׃ <S%H8597><s%> u-le-tif-'A-ret. and for beauty

וְאַתָּ֗ה <S%H859><s%> ve-'at-Tah, You תְּדַבֵּר֙ <S%H1696><s%> te-dab-Ber And thou shalt speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all חַכְמֵי־ <S%H2450><s%> chach-mei- unto all [that are] wise לֵ֔ב <S%H3820><s%> Lev, hearted אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher whom מִלֵּאתִ֖יו <S%H4390><s%> mil-le-Tiv whom I have filled ר֣וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> Ru-ach with the spirit חָכְמָ֑ה <S%H2451><s%> choch-mah of wisdom וְעָשׂ֞וּ <S%H6213><s%> ve-'a-Su that they may make אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בִּגְדֵ֧י <S%H899><s%> big-Dei garments אַהֲרֹ֛ן <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron Aaron's לְקַדְּשׁ֖וֹ <S%H6942><s%> le-kad-de-Sho to consecrate לְכַהֲנוֹ־ <S%H3547><s%> le-cha-ha-nov- him that he may minister unto me in the priest's office לִֽי׃ Li.

וְאֵ֨לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ve-'El-leh These הַבְּגָדִ֜ים <S%H899><s%> hab-be-ga-Dim And these [are] the garments אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which יַעֲשׂ֗וּ <S%H6213><s%> ya-'a-Su, which they shall make חֹ֤שֶׁן <S%H2833><s%> Cho-shen a breastplate וְאֵפוֹד֙ <S%H646><s%> ve-'e-fOd and an ephod וּמְעִ֔יל <S%H4598><s%> u-me-'Il, and a robe וּכְתֹ֥נֶת <S%H3801><s%> u-che-To-net coat תַּשְׁבֵּ֖ץ <S%H8665><s%> tash-Betz and a broidered מִצְנֶ֣פֶת <S%H4701><s%> mitz-Ne-fet a mitre וְאַבְנֵ֑ט <S%H73><s%> ve-'av-Net; and a girdle וְעָשׂ֨וּ <S%H6213><s%> ve-'a-Su and they shall make בִגְדֵי־ <S%H899><s%> vig-dei- garments קֹ֜דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> Ko-desh holy לְאַהֲרֹ֥ן <S%H175><s%> le-'a-ha-Ron for Aaron אָחִ֛יךָ <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chi-cha thy brother וּלְבָנָ֖יו <S%H1121><s%> u-le-va-Nav and his sons לְכַהֲנוֹ־ <S%H3547><s%> le-cha-ha-nov- that he may minister unto me in the priest's office לִֽי׃ Li.

וְהֵם֙ <S%H1992><s%> ve-Hem They יִקְח֣וּ <S%H3947><s%> yik-Chu And they shall take אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַזָּהָ֔ב <S%H2091><s%> haz-za-Hav, gold וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַתְּכֵ֖לֶת <S%H8504><s%> hat-te-Che-let and blue וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הָֽאַרְגָּמָ֑ן <S%H713><s%> ha-'ar-ga-Man; and purple וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et תּוֹלַ֥עַת <S%H8438><s%> to-La-'at oppressor הַשָּׁנִ֖י <S%H8144><s%> hash-sha-Ni and the scarlet וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַשֵּֽׁשׁ׃ <S%H8336><s%> hash-Shesh. and fine linen פ Peh

שְׁתֵּ֧י <S%H8147><s%> she-Tei It shall have the two כְתֵפֹ֣ת <S%H3802><s%> che-te-Fot shoulderpieces חֹֽבְרֹ֗ת <S%H2266><s%> choe-Rot, thereof joined יִֽהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> yih-yeh- shall have לּ֛וֹ lo אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to שְׁנֵ֥י <S%H8147><s%> she-Nei at the two קְצוֹתָ֖יו <S%H7098><s%> ke-tzo-Tav edges וְחֻבָּֽר׃ <S%H2266><s%> ve-chub-Bar. thereof and [so] it shall be joined together
